title: Tech Giants AWS, Microsoft, Google, IBM Step Up Efforts to Punish Kremlin - InformationWeek
content: Tech Giants AWS, Microsoft, Google, IBM Step Up Efforts to Punish Kremlin  InformationWeek
description: Tech companies are taking social responsibility to heart by stopping sales in Russia in response to the Kremlin's invasion of Ukraine. Companies are also offering humanitarian aide as well as support to the Ukrainian government. Tech companies include Apple, Google, SAP, Microsoft, Oracle, AWS, AMD, Intel, Cisco, Dell, HP, IBM, and Lenovo, among others.
